item.title: 10 years after the deadly church shooting, a new history of 'Mother Emanuel'
item.description: Reporter Kevin Sack's new book is a history of Charleston's Emanuel AME Church, the oldest Black congregation in the South, where a white supremacist killed nine worshippers a decade ago.

item.title: 'No Kings' protests against Trump planned nationwide to coincide with military parade
item.description: The coalition of organizations behind the protests say the parade is being fueled by Trump's ego. The parade, which is not formally linked to Trump, will mark the 250th anniversary of the U.S. Army.

item.title: Tanks and flyovers: Army celebrates its 250th year, Trump celebrates his 79th
item.description: The official focus of the parade is the commemoration of the U.S. Army's 250th anniversary. But critics say the president is using the military show of force to push a political agenda and celebrate his birthday, which happens to fall on the same date.

item.title: Ancient miasma theory may help explain Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s vaccine moves
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. apparently embraces the outdated "miasma theory" of disease instead of the widely accept "germ theory" of disease, which may help explain some of the actions he's been taking.

item.title: Trump's immigration response poses political risks
